Rob Toyer
=========

![Rob Toyer](https://arlingtonwa.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=10371)



Rob Toyer, Position 5
---------------------

Email
[Rob Toyer](mailto:rtoyer@arlingtonwa.gov)

Elected for term January 1, 2024 to December 31, 2027

Rob has been a self-employed financial advisor since 2010. "It’s always been my dream to be my own boss and serve others.  After working for a few other firms, I founded Toyer Wealth Management in 2010 and focus on tax preparation, investment management, insurance and home loans."

Rob also had the honor of serving 6 years in the U.S. Marine Corps and spent time in Kuwait during Operation Iraqi Freedom.

Rob and his wife Laurie have recently purchased a home on 5
Street.  "We love living close to downtown and being a part of this community."  Together, they have 3 children and are both passionate parents and spend a lot of time doing family activities.  They also spend a lot of time during the summer at the river.

Rob is a third generation elected official.  His grandmother and his uncle both served as city councilmembers and mayors.

* Marysville City Council  2011 to 2019
